title: Type of socket-outlets
fullText:
Socket-outlets shall be suitable for the intended application and location of installation.
Socket-outlets shall comply with the requirements of one of the following standards or equivalent standards:
(a) AS/NZS 3112; or
(b) AS/NZS 3123; or
(c) IEC 60309-2; or
(d) AS/NZS 3131.
